param.name: term
param.label: Search Term
param.description: The term to search for on Twitter

param.name: showterm
param.label: Display Search Term
param.description: If enabled, the term entered above will be displayed, linked to a live Twitter search of that term.

param.name: via
param.label: Retweet Via
param.description: Twitter username to retweet via.

param.name: mintweets
param.label: Minimum Tweets
param.description: The minimum number of successful hits for the search to be valid for caching and display.

param.name: rpp
param.label: Maximum Results
param.description: Maximum number of Tweets to display..

param.name: type
param.label: Search Result Type
param.description: Specifies what type of search results you would prefer to receive. The current default is mixed.

param.name: bannedwords
param.label: Banned Words
param.description: A comma separated list of banned words to search for in Tweets. When matched, the Tweet will not be displayed.

param.name: bannedusers
param.label: Banned Tweeters
param.description: A comma separated list of banned Twitter users to not display Tweets from.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether or not to cache the content of this module.

param.name: cachemaxage
param.label: Cache Age
param.description: The maximum age before the module cache expires.

param.name: anchorclass
param.label: Anchor Class
param.description: A class to add to all anchors generated by this module.

param.name: fallback
param.label: Fallback Message
param.description: The message to be displayed if no Tweets are returned or cached.

param.name: showdiagnostics
param.label: Show Diagnostics
param.description: If yes, diagnostoc informstion will be displayed in the Module Edit screen.

param.name: loadjs
param.label: Load JavaScript
param.description: If No, none of the JavaScript included with this module will be loaded, which disables the following settings.

param.name: loadjquery
param.label: Load jQuery
param.description: The carousel included with this module requires jQuery. Choose No if your site loads it elsewhere.

param.name: dispItems
param.label: Display Items
param.description: Number of items to display at once.

param.name: loop
param.label: Loop
param.description: If yes, loops the carousel.

param.name: autoSlide
param.label: Auto Slide
param.description: If yes, automatically click the Next button at a given interval

param.name: autoSlideInterval
param.label: Auto Slide Interval
param.description: The delay between each click using the autoSlide option.

param.name: btnsPosition
param.label: Button Position
param.description: The position of the buttons relative to the carousel container.

param.name: loadcss
param.label: Load CSS
param.description: If yes, loads basic stylesheet and the following settings. No allows you to custom define everything in your template.

param.name: containerwidth
param.label: Container Width
param.description: Width of the outter element.

param.name: tweetwidth
param.label: Item Width
param.description: Width of each item to be displayed.

param.name: buttondistance
param.label: Button Distance
param.description: How far from the Carousel edges left/right should the buttons be located.
